question:
According to Gramsci, which is /are the structure(s) of domination?
a. Structures of Legitimation
b. Structures of Coercion
explanation: Antonio Gramsci, a forerunner of Neo Marxism evolved a Marxian model of analysis of a capitalist society and identified two components of its Structures of Domination. a. Structure of Legitimation - These are provided by the civil society and includes the family, school, church, peer groups, etc. b. Structure of Coercion - It comprises of all government organs that are exercising power over citizens, including police, courts and prisons.
